This means that in a relationship, both male and female are expected to love mutually. In a mutual relationship both partners benefit, not one giving and the other only receiving. No! The bible says that LOVE is a gift for GOD. Furthermore, the first fruit of the spirit is LOVE, as we all know it.(Galatians 5:22)
